0.text: Innate - Intent: Yone's  total critical strike chance is multiplied by 2.5 from all other sources, but his  critical strikes deal only「 (57.5% +  31.5%) AD bonus physical damage. 」「 90% of the normal  critical strike damage. 」Additionally,「 every 1% critical strike chance in excess of 100% is converted into 0.4 bonus AD. 」「 every 50% critical strike chance in excess of 100% is converted into 20 bonus AD. 」

1.text: Innate - Steel and Spirit: Yone's basic attacks alternate between his Steel Sword and Azakana Sword on-attack. Yone begins attacking with Steel Sword, and basic attacks with Azakana Sword deal 50% AD physical damage and 50% AD magic damage.
1.html: Innate - Steel and Spirit: Yone's basic attacks alternate between his Steel Sword and Azakana Sword on-attack. Yone begins attacking with Steel Sword, and basic attacks with Azakana Sword deal 50% AD physical damage and 50% AD magic damage.

0.text: CAST TIME: 0.35 − 0.175 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

1.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 4 − 1.33 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Yone thrusts his Steel Sword in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. Mortal Steel's damage can  critically strike for「 (47% +  29.4%) AD bonus physical damage. 」「 84% of the  critical damage champions usually have. 」

1.text: If this hits at least one enemy, Yone generates a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds, stacking up to 2 times and refreshing on subsequent hits. At 2 stacks, the next Mortal Steel consumes them all to become empowered with a new effect.
1.html: If this hits at least one enemy, Yone generates a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds, stacking up to 2 times and refreshing on subsequent hits. At 2 stacks, the next Mortal Steel consumes them all to become empowered with a new effect.

2.text: Gathering Storm Bonus: Yone  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction and unleashes a whirlwind in the same direction, both dealing the same damage to enemies hit in their path and  knocking them up for 0.75 seconds, but being unable to affect the same target twice.
2.html: Gathering Storm Bonus: Yone dashes a fixed distance in the target direction and unleashes a whirlwind in the same direction, both dealing the same damage to enemies hit in their path and knocking them up for 0.75 seconds, but being unable to affect the same target twice.
markedPassages: dashes
knocking them up

3.text: Mortal Steel's thrust is  interrupted if Yone is affected by  disarming crowd control during the cast time but its  cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.
3.html: Mortal Steel's thrust is interrupted if Yone is affected by disarming crowd control during the cast time but its  cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.
markedPassages: interrupted
disarming crowd control
cooldown

0.text: CAST TIME: 0.5 − 0.19 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

1.text: STATIC COOLDOWN: 16 − 6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Yone cleaves his Azakana Sword in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to enemies hit. The total mixed damage has a minimum threshold of 40 − 410 (based on level) against  minions and a maximum threshold of 150 − 320 (based on level) against  monsters.
0.html: Active: Yone cleaves his Azakana Sword in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to enemies hit. The total mixed damage has a minimum threshold of 40 − 410 (based on level) against minions and a maximum threshold of 150 − 320 (based on level) against monsters.
markedPassages: minions
monsters

1.text: If this hits an enemy, Yone grants himself a  shield for 35 − 55 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) for 1.5 seconds, increased by 100% if it hits a  champion and by 50% for each subsequent champion hit.
1.html: If this hits an enemy, Yone grants himself a shield for 35 − 55 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) for 1.5 seconds, increased by 100% if it hits a champion and by 50% for each subsequent champion hit.
markedPassages: shield
champion

0.text: Active: Yone  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, discarding his body and entering Spirit Form for 5 seconds. Yone's body is  untargetable and is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and is reclaimed when Soul Unbound ends.
0.html: Active: Yone dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, discarding his body and entering Spirit Form for 5 seconds. Yone's body is untargetable and is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and is reclaimed when Soul Unbound ends.
markedPassages: dashes
untargetable

1.text: Spirit Form: Yone becomes  ghosted and gains  10% − 30% (based on time active) bonus movement speed. Enemy champions damaged by his basic attacks or abilities are marked. Each mark stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage that Yone deals to the target with his basic attacks and abilities.
1.html: Spirit Form: Yone becomes ghosted and gains  10% − 30% (based on time active) bonus movement speed. Enemy champions damaged by his basic attacks or abilities are marked. Each mark stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage that Yone deals to the target with his basic attacks and abilities.

2.text: Activation resets  Way of the Hunter's current sword state. Soul Unbound can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and automatically does so after the duration.
2.html: Activation resets Way of the Hunter's current sword state. Soul Unbound can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and automatically does so after the duration.
markedPassages: Way of the Hunter's

3.text: Recast: Yone remains in cast time for 0.25 seconds then  dashes back to his body with  displacement immunity, ending Spirit Form and detonating the marks on each champion to deal  true damage equal to the amount stored against each of them. After the cast time, he will  cleanse himself from all  immobilizing effects and  polymorphs* that were applied to him during it as well as all  blinds,  cripples and  drowsy effects.
3.html: Recast: Yone remains in cast time for 0.25 seconds then dashes back to his body with displacement immunity, ending Spirit Form and detonating the marks on each champion to deal  true damage equal to the amount stored against each of them. After the cast time, he will cleanse himself from all immobilizing effects and polymorphs* that were applied to him during it as well as all blinds, cripples and drowsy effects.
markedPassages: dashes
displacement immunity
true damage
cleanse
immobilizing
polymorphs
blinds
cripples
drowsy

4.text: The automatic recast is delayed if Yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast Soul Unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. Soul Unbound will also immediately recast upon  death or entering  resurrection.
4.html: The automatic recast is delayed if Yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast Soul Unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. Soul Unbound will also immediately recast upon death or entering resurrection.

resurrection

0.text: Active: Yone prepares a strike over the cast time, then marks all enemies within a line in the target direction,  knocking them down and  stunning them for 1 second. He  blinks 200 units beyond the center of the last enemy  champion struck, or else to maximum range instead.
0.html: Active: Yone prepares a strike over the cast time, then marks all enemies within a line in the target direction, knocking them down and stunning them for 1 second. He blinks 200 units beyond the center of the last enemy champion struck, or else to maximum range instead.

1.text: After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and  pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.
1.html: After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.

textContent.text: Gathering Storm Bonus: Yone  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction and unleashes a whirlwind in the same direction, both dealing the same damage to enemies hit in their path and  knocking them up for 0.75 seconds, but being unable to affect the same target twice.
textContent.html: Gathering Storm Bonus: Yone dashes a fixed distance in the target direction and unleashes a whirlwind in the same direction, both dealing the same damage to enemies hit in their path and knocking them up for 0.75 seconds, but being unable to affect the same target twice.

textContent.text: Mortal Steel's thrust is  interrupted if Yone is affected by  disarming crowd control during the cast time but its  cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.
textContent.html: Mortal Steel's thrust is interrupted if Yone is affected by disarming crowd control during the cast time but its  cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.

origin.text: CAST TIME: 0.5 − 0.19 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)
STATIC COOLDOWN: 16 − 6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

textContent.text: Active: Yone cleaves his Azakana Sword in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to enemies hit. The total mixed damage has a minimum threshold of 40 − 410 (based on level) against  minions and a maximum threshold of 150 − 320 (based on level) against  monsters.
textContent.html: Active: Yone cleaves his Azakana Sword in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to enemies hit. The total mixed damage has a minimum threshold of 40 − 410 (based on level) against minions and a maximum threshold of 150 − 320 (based on level) against monsters.

STATIC COOLDOWN: 16 − 6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

STATIC COOLDOWN: 16 − 6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Yone cleaves his Azakana Sword in a cone in the target direction, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage to enemies hit. The total mixed damage has a minimum threshold of 40 − 410 (based on level) against  minions and a maximum threshold of 150 − 320 (based on level) against  monsters.

textContent.text: If this hits an enemy, Yone grants himself a  shield for 35 − 55 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) for 1.5 seconds, increased by 100% if it hits a  champion and by 50% for each subsequent champion hit.
textContent.html: If this hits an enemy, Yone grants himself a shield for 35 − 55 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) for 1.5 seconds, increased by 100% if it hits a champion and by 50% for each subsequent champion hit.

textContent.text: Active: Yone  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, discarding his body and entering Spirit Form for 5 seconds. Yone's body is  untargetable and is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and is reclaimed when Soul Unbound ends.
textContent.html: Active: Yone dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, discarding his body and entering Spirit Form for 5 seconds. Yone's body is untargetable and is sent the same distance behind the cast location, though not through terrain, and is reclaimed when Soul Unbound ends.

textContent.text: Spirit Form: Yone becomes  ghosted and gains  10% − 30% (based on time active) bonus movement speed. Enemy champions damaged by his basic attacks or abilities are marked. Each mark stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage that Yone deals to the target with his basic attacks and abilities.
textContent.html: Spirit Form: Yone becomes ghosted and gains  10% − 30% (based on time active) bonus movement speed. Enemy champions damaged by his basic attacks or abilities are marked. Each mark stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage that Yone deals to the target with his basic attacks and abilities.

0.topLabel: time since the start of the dash

skillTabs.concerningText: Spirit Form: Yone becomes  ghosted and gains  10% − 30% (based on time active) bonus movement speed. Enemy champions damaged by his basic attacks or abilities are marked. Each mark stores a portion of the post-mitigation damage that Yone deals to the target with his basic attacks and abilities.

markedPassages: 10% − 30% (based on time active) bonus movement speed

textContent.text: Activation resets  Way of the Hunter's current sword state. Soul Unbound can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and automatically does so after the duration.
textContent.html: Activation resets Way of the Hunter's current sword state. Soul Unbound can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and automatically does so after the duration.

textContent.text: Recast: Yone remains in cast time for 0.25 seconds then  dashes back to his body with  displacement immunity, ending Spirit Form and detonating the marks on each champion to deal  true damage equal to the amount stored against each of them. After the cast time, he will  cleanse himself from all  immobilizing effects and  polymorphs* that were applied to him during it as well as all  blinds,  cripples and  drowsy effects.
textContent.html: Recast: Yone remains in cast time for 0.25 seconds then dashes back to his body with displacement immunity, ending Spirit Form and detonating the marks on each champion to deal  true damage equal to the amount stored against each of them. After the cast time, he will cleanse himself from all immobilizing effects and polymorphs* that were applied to him during it as well as all blinds, cripples and drowsy effects.

textContent.text: The automatic recast is delayed if Yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast Soul Unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. Soul Unbound will also immediately recast upon  death or entering  resurrection.
textContent.html: The automatic recast is delayed if Yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast Soul Unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. Soul Unbound will also immediately recast upon death or entering resurrection.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The automatic recast is delayed if Yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast Soul Unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. Soul Unbound will also immediately recast upon  death or entering  resurrection.

concerningSkills.skillName: the automatic recast is delayed if yone is winding up a basic attack or is unable to recast soul unbound under any circumstances, which includes if he cannot move or cast abilities. soul unbound will also immediately recast upon death or entering resurrection.

textContent.text: Active: Yone prepares a strike over the cast time, then marks all enemies within a line in the target direction,  knocking them down and  stunning them for 1 second. He  blinks 200 units beyond the center of the last enemy  champion struck, or else to maximum range instead.
textContent.html: Active: Yone prepares a strike over the cast time, then marks all enemies within a line in the target direction, knocking them down and stunning them for 1 second. He blinks 200 units beyond the center of the last enemy champion struck, or else to maximum range instead.

textContent.text: After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and  pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.
textContent.html: After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and  pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.

After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and  pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.

After 0.3 seconds, a gust rushes along the same line that deals equal parts physical and magic damage to marked enemies within the area and  pulls them towards the location Yone blinked to, then  knocks them up for 0.75 seconds.

textContent.text: The  stun ends prematurely upon the knock up.
textContent.html: The stun ends prematurely upon the knock up.
possibleConcerningAbilities: The  stun ends prematurely upon the knock up.

concerningSkills.skillName: the stun ends prematurely upon the knock up.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage and 70 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on  shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
